# web-animation-framer-motion

Motion (formerly Framer Motion) animation patterns - motion components, variants, gestures, layout animations, scroll-linked animations, accessibility

## Tags

`animation` `motion` `framer-motion` `motion-react` `transitions` `gestures` `scroll` `layout` `v11`

## Installation

Add this plugin to your Claude Code configuration:

```json
{
  "plugins": ["web-animation-framer-motion"]
}
```

## Usage

This skill is automatically available when installed.

**Requires:** web-framework-react
